ygData.subject: Re: Help!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: We re all missing the bigger question--- Why did you STOP PLAYING????? hahahaha If you re getting the acount key message, that means that either YOU or
ygData.messageBody:
We're all missing the bigger question--- Why did
you STOP PLAYING????? hahahaha<br><br>If you're
getting the acount key message, that means that either
YOU or someone else has already registered under that
code. If YOU have played before, that means you already
have entered that account key, and you can still
access it (IF YOU HAVE CONTINUED TO PAY) if you remember
your station name and password. <br><br>NOTE: IF you
stopped paying and let your account lapse-- YOU CAN NO
LONGER USE THIS ACCOUNT KEY. Unless it has been changed,
Verant's policy is that a lapsed account cannot be
reactivated and the account key becomes invalid. <br><br>At
least, that's what i've read. There was a big warning
not to let your account lapse or you would loose that
account for good. <br><br>Xela
